body.name: Green Toys Airplane - BPA Free, Phthalates Free, Red Aero Plane for Improving Aeronautical Knowledge of Children. Toys and Games
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 8 mins
features: Safe Airplane Toy: this toy air transport is made using 100% earth friendly materials. Uses 100% recycled plastic milk jugs that save energy and reduce greenhouse gas emissions. Contains no BPA, phthalates or PVC; safe for earth as well as your child

Earth-Safe Packing: just like environment-friendly materials used in the making of this toy, packing too has been done keeping in mind the safety of the environment. The toy has been packed with recyclable materials and soy inks for ecological safety

Toy Airplane Utility: this aircraft is a practical way of introducing your child with aeronautical world. Features spinning propeller, two wheel landing gear and racing trips on its rounded wings to brief little aviators about functioning of an airplane

Portable Airplane Toy: lightweight design of this plane makes spinning, rolling for little aviators easy. Easy to grasp shape helps improve the pincers grip of your child, for better grasping abilities

Easy To Clean: this playing aero plane is perfect for playing in the indoors as well as outdoors. Easy to clean and dishwasher safe. Use mild soaps or shampoo to clean the toy whenever your child prefers playing with it
body.description: Product Description Acquaint your child to aeronautical world with Green Toys Airplane. This BPA and phthalates free toy airplane is made using 100% recycled plastic milk containers. The red airplane is designed to help your little ones improve their grasping power while turning, twisting or rolling their air toy. This playing accessory features spinning propeller, two wheel landing gear and racing trips on its rounded wings which will help you to brief your little aviators about functioning of an airplane with greater ease. From the Manufacturer The Green Toys Airplane is one aircraft, Mother Nature is happy to clear for take off. Made in the USA from 100% recycled plastic milk jugs that save energy and reduce greenhouse gas emissions, this single-seater plane features a spinning propeller, two-wheeled landing gear and racing stripes on its rounded wings. Imaginations will soar to new heights as pilots-in-training practice loops, rolls and spins with this flyer. The lightweight design and tapered, easy-to-grasp body shape let even the littlest aviators ascend through flight school with ease. No BPA, phthalates, PVC or external coatings, and also meets FDA food contact standards. Packaged with recycled and recyclable materials and printed with soy inks. Recommended for ages 1 and above. Dimensions: 9"L x 9"W x 4"H.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My 2 1/2 year old grandson loves this airplane
reviews.reviewText: My 2 1/2 year old grandson loves playing with this airplane. It is just the right size for him to do pretend play. It is very durable and is chunky and has no sharp edges.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My 2yo loves this plane and “flies” it all over the house. Great line of toys

reviews.reviewerName: Very nice my two year old grandson loves it
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Recycled what better?
reviews.reviewText: I love this product because it was recycled. It took a little longer to get it because it is a recycled item and I believe it was out of stock, but it is adorable item and will have it for a long time and we can pass it on to other little kids.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I liked the mission statement of green toys but I bought it because it was looking for a toy airplane for my child and this had good reviews.It's a great toy, it's well made, light, large, looks great and my child loves it.I liked it so much I wanted to see what other toys Green Toys make, turns out a lot of fun stuff for young kids. Also, they seem to be true to their mission statement with their products. The boxing was all cardboard - no plastic tie downs - and although the toy is made of 100% recycled plastic it feels really good and sturdy. All the parts that are supposed to move do so with ease, and the toy's construction is solid.I am very impressed not just with the toy but also the company behind the toy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2022
reviews.reviewText: First off Made in USA. Great little toy my 3 year old loves it and can use it in and out of water. Very sturdy build, it would take a real hell child to break it.A lot of toys have bells and whistles now and whatnot this doesn't and that's good. Reminds me of 80's and 90's toys I had growing up and let's them use their imagination. Honestly the simple toys are the ones I loved and remembered. Ordered two more toys from Green Toys after receiving this.If your kid loves airplanes the big C-130 made by Tim Mee toys (also Made in USA) was a big hit. I had one growing up and still have my battle tank made by them all these years later. They've made them for decades and my daughter loves it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2021
reviews.reviewText: These airplane toys are extremely durable. I don't think too many kids would be able to damage them, even kids who play rough. The propeller turns. But it does not make sounds or anything like that. So it truly is a toy for a kid with an imagination to play with.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a gift for a two year old girl who has just discovered a love of planes. She loves her sturdy little plane.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My son loves this plane!
reviews.reviewText: My 3 yr old son has recently become fascinated with airplanes so i purchased this, and the green seaplane which is the same body it just has pontoons instead of wheels. He LOVES them. They're larger than i expected but i think that's a good thing, it makes them harder for him to lose. They're made from a thick sturdy plastic, these planes have been thrown into walls, dropped on the floor, even taken in the bathtub (the green one floats), this one does too but not as well. It still looks the same as it did when we took it out of the box, no dents, scratches, fading, etc. I definitely plan to buy more of these!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Läßt nicht nur Kinderherzen höher schlagen
reviews.reviewText: Top Spielzeug. Mein Enkel ist genauso begeistert, wie ich. Tolle Verarbeitung und sehr robust.
Giocattolo fantastico, davvero robusto e bello da vedere.
I bought this for a 1 year old and it’s been thrown and battered around but still looks in new condition, good sturdy toy.
